intro.description:
This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to create a new project for our DSL and associated artifacts.
To learn more about using cheat sheets, click the help button in the top right corner (?).

item.title: Create a new DSL Project
item.description:
To create a new DSL Project, navigate to File->New...->Domain-Specific Language->Empty DSL Project.
Alternatively, click the following button to perform the task.
